config.EnableConstructionMenu.name: Construction Menu
config.EnableConstructionMenu.descriptio: Adds an easel that opens the carpenter menu and a bookstand that opens the wizard building menu (after respective quest is completed). Requires MMAP (Nexus 28423).
config.SeasonOverride.name: Season Override
config.SeasonOverride.description: Changes the seasonal appearance of the greenhouse, must reload the save to update.
